lead_paragraph: Manchester United have signed midfielder Henrikh Mkhitaryan from Borussia Dortmund on a four-year contract, with the option of a further year, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Mkhitaryan Signs for Man United on Four-Year Deal
headline.main: Mkhitaryan Signs for Man United on Four-Year Deal

snippet: Manchester United have signed midfielder Henrikh Mkhitaryan from Borussia Dortmund on a four-year contract, with the option of a further year, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....
